title: Construction Site Summary:

summary.title: Rainfall Management
summary.content: **Risk**: Concerns about the roof drainage system's capacity to handle expected rainfall need addressing to prevent water damage.

summary.title: Safety and Compliance
summary.content: **Quality Control**: Staircase compliance with safety regulations and HVAC duct alignment issues require immediate attention.

summary.title: Material Suitability
summary.content: **Quality & Risk**: Questions about exterior wall material suitability for the local climate and the need for additional insulation to improve energy efficiency.

summary.title: Structural Integrity
summary.content: **Design**: Concerns about the roof's load-bearing capacity and column spacing in the main hall suggest a need for reassessment.

summary.title: Interior Design
summary.content: **Design & Quality**: Feedback on the interior being too dark and suggestions for alternative fa√ßade cladding to improve aesthetics.

overall: The focus is on ensuring safety, optimizing materials for climate, and addressing structural and aesthetic concerns, with a strong emphasis on quality control and risk management.
